VIII.iii.2.B.1.a
.
Repeal of Graduated Ratings for Inactive TB
Public Law
90-493
repealed sections 38 U.S.C. 314(q) and 38 U.S.C. 356 that provided graduated ratings for inactive tuberculosis (TB).
Important
:Â  The repealed sections
still
apply to any Veteran who was receiving, or was entitled to receive, disability compensation for TB on August 19, 1968, under
38 CFR 3.959
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section B - Awards for Graduated Tuberculosis (TB)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section B
